newsitem.title: UK: Cazenove Indian GDR Index down 1.55 percent.
newsitem.headline: Cazenove Indian GDR Index down 1.55 percent.

text.p: The Cazenove Indian GDR Index fell 1.07 points, 1.55 percent, to 68.03 points after the Bombay Stock Exchange 30 share index fell 21.2 points to a provisional 3,071.60.
The premium for GDRs over stocks on the local market was 11.76 percent after yesterday's 12.36 percent.
The Cazenove index is a capitalisation weighted basket of Indian global depositary receipts and measures the change from midday on the previous trading day to midday today.
